articles.author: Rob Wile
articles.title: Stock market updates: Dow jumps after Trump tariff reversal - NBC News
articles.description: Stocks were poised for large gains after President Donald Trump said he was resetting a deadline for imposing tariffs on the European Union.
articles.content:
Stocks climbed Tuesday after President Donald Trump said he was resetting a deadline for imposing tariffs on the European Union.
The broad S&P 500 closed just over 2%, its biggest jump in more t… [+2798 chars]
